articles.description: Nearly 400 patients with Covid-19 are hospitalised in the North.
articles.content:
NORTHERN IRELAND HAS confirmed a further 263 cases of Covid-19 this afternoon.
In its latest update, Northern Irelands Department of Health said that four more people have died with Covid-19.
Today… [+962 chars]
